AzTask.Name: OrdersAdapter
AzTask.Description: Orders adapter querying orders webservice for order processing and updates.

AzTask.Name: OrdersConfigurationEditor
AzTask.Description: Maintains orders configuration data for the site.

AzTask.Name: OrdersViewer
AzTask.Description: Customer service representative with permissions to view orders

AzTask.Name: OrdersAdministrator
AzTask.Description: Super user managing data integrity and cleanup issues.

AzOperation.Name: View PaymentMethods
AzOperation.Description: Has View Permission on the Payment Methods.

AzOperation.Name: Write PaymentMethods
AzOperation.Description: Has Write(Update/Create/Delete) Permission on the Payment Methods.

AzOperation.Name: View ShippingMethods
AzOperation.Description: Has View Permission on the Shipping Methods.

AzOperation.Name: Write ShippingMethods
AzOperation.Description: Has Write (Create/Update/Delete) Permission on the Shipping Methods.

AzOperation.Name: View Baskets
AzOperation.Description: Has View access on the entire Basket.

AzOperation.Name: View PurchaseOrder except Payments
AzOperation.Description: Has View access on the entire Purchase Order except the PaymentCollection.

AzOperation.Name: View PurchaseOrder Payments
AzOperation.Description: Has View permission on the PaymentCollection of the PurchaseOrder.

AzOperation.Name: Update PurchaseOrder
AzOperation.Description: Can update the PurchaseOrder properties and the contained collections.

AzRole.Name: OrdersAdministrator
AzRole.Description: Super user managing data integrity and cleanup issues.

AzRole.Name: OrdersConfigurationEditor
AzRole.Description: Maintains orders configuration data for the site.

AzRole.Name: OrdersViewer
AzRole.Description: Junior Telephone customer service representative with permissions to view orders

AzRole.Name: OrdersAdapter
AzRole.Description: Orders adapter querying orders webservice for order processing and updates.

AzTask.Name: Manage Basket Viewing
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to search and view baskets.

AzTask.Name: Manage viewing PurchaseOrder except Payments
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to search PurchaseOrders and view the entire PurchaseOrders except its PaymentCollection.

AzTask.Name: Manage PurchaseOrder Payments Viewing
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to view the PaymentCollection of PurchaseOrders.

AzTask.Name: Manage PaymentMethods Viewing
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to search and view Payment Methods.

AzTask.Name: Manage ShippingMethods Viewing
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to search and view Shipping Methods.

AzTask.Name: Manage PaymentMethodCache refresh
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to refresh the Payment Method Cache.

AzTask.Name: Manage ShippingMethodCache Refresh
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to refresh the Shipping Method Cache.

AzTask.Name: Manage updating PurchaseOrders
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to update the PurchaseOrders and its contained collections.

AzTask.Name: Manage writing PaymentMethods
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to create / delete / update Payment Methods.

AzTask.Name: Manage writing ShippingMethods
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to create / delete / update Shipping Methods.

AzTask.Name: Manage creating PurchaseOrders
AzTask.Description: Has permissions to create new PurchaseOrders.
